document.full_text: steve jobs, responding to growing public pressure, broke apple inc's silence on wednesday to defend the iphone's use of location data and stressed that it had never tracked the movements of its customers.
document.title: apple denies tracking iphone customers
lines_and_colors: steve jobs, responding to growing public pressure, broke apple inc's silence on wednesday to defend the iphone's use of location data and stressed that it had never tracked the movements of its customers.
